DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk.synopsis: Daisy AD for after we use the zaith'isk.
DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk.how_to_trigger: CRE > Infirmary > go to the doctor > use the zaith'isk

PAD_DoorIsLocked.synopsis: The player tries to open the door after the Gith Doctor has left, locking you in.
PAD_DoorIsLocked.how_to_trigger: Plays when the doctor leaves the room and locks the door.

AD_CombatDoctor_PlayerDown.synopsis: CombatAD after player gets downed fir the first time in combat with the doctor.

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk.synopsis: |Laezel is shocked at the Zaithisk exploding. If she was the one in it, she is confused and doubts. If she was dragged out,
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk.how_to_trigger: Triggers automatically after the Zaith'isk explodes and took part of the dialog.

DoctorWaitsAtDevice.synopsis: She urges the player to lie down in the Zaith'isk.
DoctorWaitsAtDevice.how_to_trigger: Try to talk to the doctor while she's at the device.

OffstageArdent_SentToCaptain.synopsis: An Ardent shows up after the infirmary ambush and sends the player to talk to the captain. This is to communicate to the player that they may continue exploring the Creche.
OffstageArdent_SentToCaptain.how_to_trigger: Load up cre_main_Ago to 1285; -2; -801talk to the doctor asking to use the zaithiskbreak the zaithisk by completing the dialoggo out of the room and fight the ambushing giththe ardent will show up to say this line.

AD_DoctorReactsToExplosion.synopsis: The doctor reacts to the explosion and runs off to call the guards.
AD_DoctorReactsToExplosion.how_to_trigger: Start the Device dialog without the Doctor noticing you, then explode the device.Can potentially trigger almost parallel with Laezel's dialog reacting to the explosion, if present. (CRE_GithInfirmary_AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk)

Doctor.synopsis: The player speaks to the doctor and can ask to get their tadpole removed. They can then agree to step into the device to be 'cured', or refuse and have the doctor try to leave and get the guards.
Doctor.how_to_trigger: Talk to the doctor in the infirmary in the gith creche.teleport S_CRE_Doctorof goto 1287; -2; -802

Device.synopsis: The player attempts to remove their tadpole with the device, not realising that it will kill them as it does so. The player has opportunity to save themselves from the machine. If they fail or refuse those opportunities, Daisy will intervene. Variations based on whether the doctor and Lae'zel are present or not.
Device.how_to_trigger: start game with new character, add companions using oe debugbookloadlevel CRE_Main_Ateleport S_CRE_Doctoras a companion, speak w doctorsay your friend needs a tadpole removedswitch to plyr and speak with doctoraccept help and interact with zaith'isk

AD_DoctorAtAmbush.synopsis: The doctor orders the guards to kill the players as the infirmary ambush begins.
AD_DoctorAtAmbush.how_to_trigger: Trigger the Gith Doctor to leave during her dialogue and lock the door on you, and then wait for the Gith to ambush you,

DeviceDoctorInterrupt.synopsis: The doctor prevents the player from using the device.
DeviceDoctorInterrupt.how_to_trigger: Use the Zaith'isk before speaking to the doctor.

AD_DoctorGoesToDevice.synopsis: The doctor urges the player to come and interact with the device.
AD_DoctorGoesToDevice.how_to_trigger: Plays when the doctor goes to the device, triggered in the Doctor dialog.

DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk_0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk_0.text: Do you see the truth, now? It was always going to kill you.

DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk_1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk_1.text: Incredible... your parasite is even stronger now.

DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk_3.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_AfterZaithisk_3.text: You were lucky I was there to save you once again.

PAD_DoorIsLocked_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DoorIsLocked_0.text: Locked in. That's rarely good news.

AD_CombatDoctor_PlayerDown_0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
AD_CombatDoctor_PlayerDown_0.text: Don't touch! That specimen is mine.

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_0.text: No! I followed the protocol. I must be cleansed!

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_2.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_2.text: No. NO! By the Queen's blade, what have you done?!

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_3.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_3.text: No. This cannot be - purification is my right! Treachery against my queen at every turn.

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_4.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_4.text: I must see the inquisitor in his chamber. He will guide me to purity. He will see protocol done!

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_5.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_5.text: Queen Vlaakith, undying regent - I have followed protocol, yet I am forsaken!

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_6.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_6.text: No. This cannot be - purification is my right! Treachery against my queen at every turn.

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_1.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_1.text: I'll send a message to Vlaakith. The inquisitor's chambers - there must be a way...

AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_7.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk_7.text: No - it can't be. It can't. This was my right!

DoctorWaitsAtDevice_0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
DoctorWaitsAtDevice_0.text: Go on. My time is vital - do not squander it.

OffstageArdent_SentToCaptain_0.speaker: 62add678-f00a-4603-8938-06ad25c03d18
OffstageArdent_SentToCaptain_0.text: This mess - this is your doing? Impressive. Our Captain may have use for you - report to her immediately.

OffstageArdent_SentToCaptain_1.speaker: 62add678-f00a-4603-8938-06ad25c03d18
OffstageArdent_SentToCaptain_1.text: I am not in the habit of asking twice, istik. The Captain, now.

AD_DoctorReactsToExplosion_0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
AD_DoctorReactsToExplosion_0.text: The zaith'isk! Stay right where you are.

Doctor_41.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_41.text: Are you the 'friend' with the tadpole problem?

Doctor_160.speaker: Player
Doctor_160.text: Yes, can you help me get rid of it?

Doctor_98.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_98.text: Lie down on the zaith'isk, and your troubles will be over.

Doctor_128.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_128.text: Chk. If you aren't here for treatment, then get out of my infirmary.

Doctor_60.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_60.text: Vertical incision from pineal eye to end of notochord.
Doctor_60.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The doctor is leaning forward, peering into a microscope. She is conducting an autopsy on a mindflayer tadople using the gith medical device. 
She uses her hands to psionically twist the orientation of the tadpole in the sphere that holds it. InternalNodeContext: She is absorbed in her work and doesn't react to the player's entry into the room. She knows they're there, but she's more interested in her work than them.NodeContext: dictating to herself

Doctor_19.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_19.text: Intestinal colouration consistent with samples 231 to 259.
Doctor_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: She zooms the machine's lens in on the body of the dissected tadpole.

Doctor_56.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_56.text: Do you have a question or are you just going to stand there gawking?
Doctor_56.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She addresses the player without turning around. 

She turns at the end of her question to see the player's responseNodeContext: nonchalant

Doctor_217.speaker: Lae'zel
Doctor_217.text: I am a Child of Gith, not discarded rat-flesh. Am I not due your respect?

Doctor_197.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_197.text: Perhaps, perhaps not. Let the istik with you speak, and I will decide what respect you are owed.

Doctor_15.speaker: Player
Doctor_15.text: I'd prefer Lae'zel to speak on my behalf.

Doctor_22.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_22.text: Lae'zel, is it? Fine - and be quick. My work is of vital import.

Doctor_215.speaker: Lae'zel
Doctor_215.text: We carry ghaik tadpoles, and have done so for countless days - yet we show no symptoms. We must enter the zaith'isk.

Doctor_135.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_135.text: You are infected, but showing no signs of cerebral impairment? Fascinating.

Doctor_78.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_78.text: The zaith'isk is our last means of defence. It is used for the removal of illithid tadpoles.

Doctor_134.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_134.text: Why do you want to know?

Doctor_102.speaker: Player
Doctor_102.text: I am Lae'zel of K'liir. I come to be purified.

Doctor_186.speaker: Player
Doctor_186.text: I require your assistance in removing a tadpole.

Doctor_157.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_157.text: You must be desperate, to seek my aid.
Doctor_157.context: NodeContext: obervational, not too smug or opportunistic at this point

Doctor_142.speaker: Player
Doctor_142.text: My friend is infected - I'm looking for a way to help them.

Doctor_218.speaker: Player
Doctor_218.text: I've never seen one up close. And you seem a favourable teacher.

Doctor_125.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_125.text: Chk. I have no desire to teach, though your request is understandable.

Doctor_57.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_57.text: You do not gain true knowledge by demanding it of others. It must be earned.

Doctor_99.speaker: Player
Doctor_99.text: What are you hoping to learn from dissecting that thing?

Doctor_188.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_188.text: Nothing your kind is capable of understanding.
Doctor_188.context: NodeContext: a statement of fact - not intended to be an insult

Doctor_206.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_206.text: The better question is - what brings an istik  to my infirmary?

Doctor_155.speaker: Player
Doctor_155.text: Is that thing's host still alive?

Doctor_178.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_178.text: A very specific question, one that speaks of a more personal motivation for asking.
Doctor_178.context: NodeContext: logical, a bit smug - she's already figured out you're infected

Doctor_13.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_13.text: I can only deduce... you have a parasite of your own.

Doctor_187.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_187.text: Tell me, how long have you been infected?

Doctor_73.speaker: Player
Doctor_73.text: A few days? I stopped counting when I ran out of fingers.

Doctor_129.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_129.text: Hmm. A sign that your cognitive abilities are not so robust as they appear.

Doctor_39.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_39.text: Still, you appear to be functioning far beyond the capacity of others I've observed in your condition. How fascinating.
Doctor_39.context: NodeContext: curiosity getting the best of her

Doctor_172.speaker: Player
Doctor_172.text: Longer than you'd expect ceremorphosis to take. And with none of the symptoms.

Doctor_35.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_35.text: Fascinating. So you're conscious of your infection, but showing no signs of cerebral impairment.

Doctor_91.speaker: Player
Doctor_91.text: Too long. Just get this thing out of me.

Doctor_82.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_82.context: NodeContext: smug, knows that granting this request will kill the player

Doctor_148.speaker: Player
Doctor_148.text: I'm not infected. I'm asking for a friend.

Doctor_63.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_63.text: Ah. Friendship. A curious burden I confess I have no interest in carrying.
Doctor_63.context: NodeContext: As though "friendship" is a phenomenon to be observed

Doctor_173.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_173.text: Still, I would not withhold aid if it furthers our collective efforts against the ghaik.

Doctor_10.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_10.text: And you expected charity from us?

Doctor_136.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_136.text: You are a unique specimen. All right, my curiosity is piqued.

Doctor_121.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_121.text: Tell me, how long has your friend been infected?

Doctor_5.speaker: Player
Doctor_5.text: A day or two. They seem to be fine so far.

Doctor_31.speaker: Player
Doctor_31.text: Longer than you'd expect ceremorphosis to take. And with none of the symptoms.

Doctor_94.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_94.text: I see you have some knowledge of the process.
Doctor_94.context: InternalNodeContext: She knows the 'friend' is really you. You're the one who's infected.

Doctor_211.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_211.text: You'll be aware then, that your friend is on borrowed time.

Doctor_145.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_145.text: Bring them here, and you'll have a live demonstration of what the zaith'isk can do.
Doctor_145.context: NodeContext: excited at the prospect of using the zaith'isk, knows the zaith'isk will kill them

Doctor_147.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_147.text: Bring them here for purification. I will be waiting.
Doctor_147.context: NodeContext: excited at the prospect of using the zaith'isk, knows the zaith'isk will kill them

Doctor_192.speaker: Player
Doctor_192.text: I shouldn't have said anything. It's not my place.

Doctor_87.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_87.text: Come now, no need to be shy. I assure you I'd be delighted to help this 'friend' of yours.

Doctor_112.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_112.text: If this friend is kin, their cowardice does little to earn my assistance.

Doctor_7.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_7.text: If not, I question your choice of 'friends'.

Doctor_16.speaker: Player
Doctor_16.text: I lied, it's me. I'm the one with the tadpole.

Doctor_50.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_50.text: Is that so? Dishonesty towards your superiors is an ill-advised behaviour.

Doctor_4.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_4.text: Though I will admit, it's fascinating that you're still able to lie at this stage of infection.
Doctor_4.context: NodeContext: curiosity getting the best of her

Doctor_93.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_93.text: I suspected as much. Though I am fascinated that you've retained the ability to lie about it.
Doctor_93.context: InternalNodeContext: She was waiting for you to come clean. NodeContext: curiosity getting the best of her

Doctor_164.speaker: Player
Doctor_164.text: Fine. I'll leave you to it then.

Doctor_58.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_58.text: If your friend is not capable of asking me directly, I see no reason to get involved.

Doctor_9.speaker: Player
Doctor_9.text: Not me personally, but my friend does. I'm trying to find a way to help them.

Doctor_106.speaker: Player
Doctor_106.text: Merely curious. You seem an expert on the subject.

Doctor_95.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_95.text: Your assumption is correct. My experiments have been vital in supporting our queen's efforts against the ghaik.

Doctor_194.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_194.text: Few of our kin understand that wars can be fought with science, as well as swords.

Doctor_79.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_79.text: Chk. Curiosity without toil is like a broken viewing glass: unfocused and incapable of insight.
Doctor_79.context: InternalNodeContext: She considers your intellect far beneath her, but is prepared to entertain the possibility that she's wrong.

Doctor_96.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_96.text: Let's see what knowledge your labours have borne so far.

Doctor_40.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_40.text: Tell me, what is your understanding of ceremorphosis?

Doctor_0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_0.text: Chk. Clearly our schooling is not what it used to be.

Doctor_168.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_168.text: The tadpole is a parasite. Once it consumes enough of your brain matter, it instigates an excruciating transformation.

Doctor_132.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_132.text: Every fibre, every sinew of your being is torn apart and reformed into the repugnant flesh of a ghaik, or 'illithid'. That is ceremorphosis.

Doctor_88.speaker: Player
Doctor_88.text: Look, I haven't told you everything. I'm infected...

Doctor_45.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_45.text: Is that so? Conscious of the tadpole's presence, yet able to pretend otherwise. Fascinating.

Doctor_28.speaker: Player
Doctor_28.text: Thanks for that. Learn something new every day.

Doctor_12.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_12.text: A facile achievement for those who know so little to begin with.

Doctor_66.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_66.text: The stupidity encouraged on this plane never ceases to amaze me. Listen carefully.

Doctor_176.speaker: Player
Doctor_176.text: It's the seven day process by which an illithid tadpole eats away the host's brain and takes control of its body.

Doctor_75.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_75.text: Chk. I see you're somewhat familiar with the material. Though hardly up to date.

Doctor_52.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_52.text: Unless you have anything new of your own to share, I must get back to my sample. It's drying out.

Doctor_221.speaker: Player
Doctor_221.text: Report the details of your own infection, as protocol dictates.

Doctor_208.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_208.text: Cursed is the day that even we become ghaik incubators.

Doctor_25.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_25.text: First the nautiloid's arrival, then the ghaik swarming around Moonrise...

Doctor_185.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_185.text: Though - you are like nothing I've seen before. You remain lucid, when you should have succumbed.
Doctor_185.context: NodeContext: wheels starting to turn - she's going to experiment on you

Doctor_8.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_8.text: Infected, and yet capable of maintaining a falsehood. How unusual.
Doctor_8.context: InternalNodeContext: She's been waiting for you to come clean. NodeContext: her intelligence is validated

Doctor_37.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_37.text: Much like your decision to seek aid from us. The infestation at Moonrise has created strange bedfellows indeed.

Doctor_2.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_2.text: You aren't the first istik to require my treatment - though you're the most lucid by some margin.
Doctor_2.context: NodeContext: trying to sound casual, secretly excited. "treatment" = fatally experimented on

Doctor_47.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_47.text: Either your tadpole is special, or you are. We must find out which.
Doctor_47.context: NodeContext: Excited - this is an exciting scientific prospect

Doctor_23.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_23.text: Go to the zaith'isk. I will ensure you are cured.
Doctor_23.context: CinematicNodeContext: She gestures towards the Zaith'isk. NodeContext: Excited - this is an exciting scientific prospect

Doctor_97.speaker: Player
Doctor_97.text: I'm not familiar with the term. What's a zaith'isk?

Doctor_163.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_163.text: The apparatus at the top of those stairs. Quickly now - time is of the essence.

Doctor_14.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_14.text: It will relieve you of the specimen lodged in your cerebral cortex. What else?
Doctor_14.context: NodeContext: knows it will kill the player, amused by their suspicion

Doctor_139.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_139.text: It will be worth it. I assure you.

Doctor_180.speaker: Player
Doctor_180.text: I have waited long for this.

Doctor_122.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_122.text: Your gratitude is unnecessary. The procedure brings its own rewards.

Doctor_72.speaker: Player
Doctor_72.text: Actually... Maybe I'll come back later.

Doctor_1.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_1.text: There are more rudimentary methods of extraction, if you find our technology intimidating.

Doctor_86.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_86.text: Wait here. I'll require some assistance.
Doctor_86.context: InternalNodeContext: She's lying - she's actually going to fetch the guards.

Doctor_46.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_46.text: If you would prefer another extraction method, kin, you have only to ask.

Doctor_26.speaker: Player
Doctor_26.text: Tell her of the True Souls you've encountered.

Doctor_53.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_53.text: It sounds like they've discovered a way to exist in a state of suspended ceremorphosis.

Doctor_117.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_117.text: Only a powerful magic would be able to maintain such a stasis, but the Absolutists we've encountered showed no such ability.

Doctor_70.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_70.text: You have my thanks for these observations of yours. It seems you have a scientist's eye after all.

Doctor_92.speaker: Player
Doctor_92.text: Give your observations of the tadpoled Absolutists in Moonrise Towers.

Doctor_153.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_153.text: So, they are gathering. And in a state of suspended ceremorphosis.

Doctor_54.speaker: Player
Doctor_54.text: Tell how you vanquished the tadpoled Absolutists in Moonrise Towers.

Doctor_216.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_216.text: So, they were gathering. And somehow doing so in a state of suspended ceremorphosis.

Doctor_110.speaker: Player
Doctor_110.text: Relate your 'findings'. Use lots of long, complicated words.

Doctor_114.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_114.text: Your knowledge betrays a closer experience than you let on. You're infected.

Doctor_44.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_44.text: So you are not an idiot. But nor are you an intellectual.

Doctor_165.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_165.text: To be expected. We each have our weapons to wield. Some are sharper than others.
Doctor_165.context: InternalNodeContext: With no disrespect, but it's clear she considers her craft (science) superior to yours.

Doctor_118.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_118.text: A shame. I had hopes for you, istik.
Doctor_118.context: InternalNodeContext: Genuinely disappointed - she's starved of a good intellectual jousting session.

Doctor_204.speaker: Player
Doctor_204.text: Mime every disgusting stage of transformation into a mind flayer.

Doctor_104.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_104.text: What a bizarre display. And yet, surprisingly accurate.
Doctor_104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Focus on the doctor's reaction here, one of incredulityInternalNodeContext: Her curiosity gets the better of her - she is thinking out loud. NodeContext: Genuine curiousity

Doctor_100.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_100.text: You appear to have somatic knowledge of the process, and yet you remain in possession of your cerebral faculties.
Doctor_100.context: NodeContext: holding back some excitement - this is genuinely new territory. As though making a study of the player

Doctor_68.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_68.text: You've spent too much time with istiks, kin.
Doctor_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Focus on the doctor's reaction here, one of incredulity

Doctor_141.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_141.text: Come back when you've worked these airs out of your system.

Doctor_201.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_201.text: Well you certainly have a flair for something.
Doctor_201.context: CinematicNodeContext: Focus on the doctor's reaction here, one of incredulity

Doctor_220.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_220.text: But I've more interest in substance than... whatever it is you're trying to offer me.

Doctor_183.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_183.text: Now go, continue your education elsewhere. You've delayed my work long enough.

Doctor_115.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_115.text: Very good - you've grasped the basic definition. If I ever misplace my dictionary, I'll know who to ask.

Doctor_222.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_222.text: Well, whatever matter your skull contains, it clearly isn't cerebral in nature. Ceremorphosis is no threat to you.
Doctor_222.context: CinematicNodeContext: awkward beat on the player staring at the doctor

Doctor_18.speaker: Player
Doctor_18.text: I have first-hand knowledge. I'm infected.

Doctor_127.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_127.text: True curiosity does not demand answers - it finds them for itself.

Doctor_198.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_198.text: If it's an education you seek, go to the training room. I'm sure the sa'varsh will be happy to oblige.

Doctor_170.speaker: Player
Doctor_170.text: I've been told someone here knows how to remove tadpoles. I'm guessing that's you.

Doctor_59.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_59.text: Guessing is an idiotic habit. Theorise. Postulate. Deduce. Never guess.
Doctor_59.context: NodeContext: pet peeve, can't help but correct you

Doctor_205.speaker: Player
Doctor_205.text: I've got a tadpole needs removing. Can you help me?

Doctor_83.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_83.text: If you require treatment, take a seat, kin. Or do you have a question?
Doctor_83.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She addresses the player without turning around. 

She turns at the end of her question to see the player's response

Doctor_162.speaker: Lae'zel
Doctor_162.text: Go on. You know what we require.

Doctor_32.speaker: Player
Doctor_32.text: I am Lae'zel of K'liir. I have come to be purified.

Doctor_191.speaker: Player
Doctor_191.text: What do you hope to gain from dissecting the ghaik spawn?

Doctor_175.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_175.text: I'm analysing changes in the worm's digestive tract following consumption of cerebral matter.

Doctor_61.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_61.text: Most of our kin find such work rather tedious. I wonder - what makes you so curious?
Doctor_61.context: NodeContext: pleased to have had the opportunity to pontificate

Doctor_169.speaker: Player
Doctor_169.text: Is that machine a zaith'isk? Is it operational?

Doctor_64.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_64.text: Operational? It is exemplary. I maintain it myself.
Doctor_64.context: NodeContext: smug - proud of her equipment

Doctor_17.speaker: Player
Doctor_17.text: I have a tadpole of my own needs removing. Can you help with that?

Doctor_126.speaker: Player
Doctor_126.text: Are you the ghustil? I've been infected and require purification.

Doctor_131.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_131.text: You were interested in the zaith'isk.
Doctor_131.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor is conducting an autopsy on a mindflayer tadople. She has her back to the player. She talks over her shoulder to them. InternalNodeContext: She knows they player is there, but she's more interested in her work than them.

Doctor_140.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_140.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor is conducting an autopsy on a mindflayer tadople. She has her back to the player.InternalNodeContext: She is absorbed in her work and doesn't react to the player's entry into the room. She knows they're there, but she's more interested in her work than them.NodeContext: disengaged

Doctor_166.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_166.text: Must you keep bothering me? If you have questions, read a book.
Doctor_166.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor is conducting an autopsy on a mindflayer tadople. She has her back to the player.InternalNodeContext: She is absorbed in her work and doesn't react to the player's entry into the room. She knows they're there, but she's more interested in her work than them.NodeContext: disengaged

Doctor_76.speaker: Player
Doctor_76.text: I have a confession. I've been tadpoled, and I need help.

Doctor_207.speaker: Player
Doctor_207.text: What will the zaith'isk do to them?

Doctor_161.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_161.text: The specifics are... complicated. It is not a comfortable process, but a necessary one.

Doctor_149.speaker: Player
Doctor_149.text: It was me all along - I'm the one who's infected.

Doctor_181.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_181.text: Is that so? Then of course, you will be treated first. Lie down when you're ready.
Doctor_181.context: NodeContext: with a smile - she knows the treatment will kill you

Doctor_30.speaker: Player
Doctor_30.text: All right, I'll go fetch them.

Doctor_29.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_29.text: Best not to delay. They may soon be beyond even my capabilities to save.

Doctor_190.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Doctor_190.text: Your presence is not welcome here, k'chakhi.

Device_29.speaker: Player
Device_29.text: The zaith'isk. Vlaakith's purity, distilled. My duty. My right.

Device_60.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_60.text: Take your place in the zaith'isk. Purification awaits.

Device_53.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_53.text: You're infected too, child? How fortunate you crossed my path. Take a seat.

Device_91.speaker: Player
Device_91.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player's face is a picture of discomfort.

Device_4.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_4.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. Call to your queen!
Device_4.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith. Vlaakith's will above all.

Device_40.speaker: Player
Device_40.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. My Queen, hear me!
Device_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The psionic forcefield intensifies (brightness/colour/size/otherwise). NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith. Vlaakith's will above all. Spoken with increasing furor.

Device_164.speaker: Player
Device_164.context: CinematicNodeContext: The machine rumbles/shudders  it's being pushed to its capacityNodeContext: Lae'zel in absolute torture.  lahsh-ah-KLAH! Make me pure!

Device_39.speaker: Player
Device_39.text: No... stop talking... I don't understand... NO!
Device_39.context: NodeContext: Responding to Daisy who she hears in her head.

Device_74.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_74.text: My child! To whom do you speak?

Device_13.speaker: Player
Device_13.text: Damn it all! What has the zaith'isk torn from me? My Queen, why do you forsake me?

Device_124.speaker: Player
Device_124.text: Ngh! Vlaakith tavki na'zin. Vlaakith tavki na'zin!
Device_124.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith TAHV-key nah-ZINN. Lae'zel reacts to the initial pain, then chants a meditation phrase, trying to stay calm in the face of the coming agony.

Device_67.speaker: Narrator
Device_67.text: *The zaith'isk. In its unnatural embrace lies the hope of being cured. You feel your parasite stir.*

Device_115.speaker: Narrator
Device_115.text: *Smoke rises like hot breath, but whatever semblance of life once powered the zaith'isk is gone.*

Device_128.speaker: Narrator
Device_128.text: *The device is strange, made of taut flesh and pockmarked metal. It waits for something.*
Device_128.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.

Device_1.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_1.text: I thought your friend was the one infected?

Device_149.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_149.text: As I suspected. Take a seat.
Device_149.context: NodeContext: Not impressed, wants to get this over with.

Device_109.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_109.text: There is nothing on any plane stronger than a zaith'isk for curing unwanted afflictions.
Device_109.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor gestures insistently for you to lie down in the machine.

Device_206.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_206.text: Purification is your duty. The pain is hardly relevant.

Device_45.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_45.context: NodeContext: Chk - guttural sounding version of 'tsk'.

Device_105.speaker: Player
Device_105.text: Look to your companions for guidance.

Device_161.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_161.text: You deny me my due, then seek my comfort? Bah. Sit, and be pure.

Device_111.speaker: Player
Device_111.text: Look to your companions for guidance.

Device_79.speaker: Wyll
Device_79.text: It's only a horrific machine of unspeakable form. What's the worst that could happen?

Device_154.speaker: Shadowheart
Device_154.text: I don't like the look of this thing. Its 'cure' could be a metal bolt punched through your skull.

Device_121.speaker: Karlach
Device_121.text: Never stick your head in an extraplanar torture device. A rule to live by.

Device_9.speaker: Astarion
Device_9.text: I'm all for it, but... well, you first.
Device_9.context: NodeContext: Player's asking Astarion if they should use a dangerous machine to remove the tadpoles

Device_168.speaker: Gale
Device_168.text: Well... could go either way. But we came this far - should at least try.

Device_95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player lays down in the zaith'isk.

Device_3.speaker: Narrator
Device_3.text: *Your body grows cold, its warmth sapped by the cold metal seat. The machine awakens.*
Device_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Zaith'isk 'warms up' to a low hum.

Device_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The 'head' part of the machine descends and the jaws clamp around the player's head, neck, shoulders.  The player squirms uncomfortably - they can't move.

Device_135.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_135.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
Device_135.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The doctor fusses, checks everything is set up correctly.
NodeContext: Instructive - this is very important

Device_33.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The mandibles of the Zaith'isk move towards the player's forehead, as if to puncture it. 
The player grimaces.

Device_22.speaker: Narrator
Device_22.text: *Layers of magic weave themselves tightly around your head. The tadpole squirms and contracts. It's trying to hide.*
Device_22.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player looks worried

Device_152.speaker: Narrator
Device_152.text: *The device possesses immense, but unfocused, power. If you fail to direct it towards the tadpole, your faculties could face permanent harm.*

Device_46.speaker: Narrator
Device_46.text: *You realise the device is hunting your parasite. But it's doing so blindly. Without direction, your faculties could be permanently damaged.*

Device_0.speaker: Narrator
Device_0.text: *Your skull groans and bends under the pressure. Then - agony.*
Device_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through their brain

Device_125.speaker: Player
Device_125.text: Follow the ghustil's instruction. Seek the tadpole.

Device_170.speaker: Narrator
Device_170.text: *Through waves of torment, you search for the parasite's lurking presence.*

Device_6.speaker: Narrator
Device_6.text: *The device searches too. You sense its hunger, its craving. It wants the tadpole, but maybe something more...*

Device_49.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_49.text: Keep going, my child. The ghaik spawn will soon be gone.
Device_49.context: NodeContext: Slight unease - this is taking longer than usual

Device_198.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_198.text: This torment. You - you must persist. You must be cleansed!

Device_55.speaker: Narrator
Device_55.text: *Your vision narrows. You sense myriad spectres of githyanki past. This is their fate. This is their anguish.*
Device_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

Device_101.speaker: Narrator
Device_101.text: *You feel yourself ebbing away, while the parasite only grows stronger. It's evolving.*

Device_48.speaker: Player
Device_48.text: Remember your orders. Bring the device closer.

Device_194.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_194.text: That's it. Soon your suffering will be over, kin.

Device_136.speaker: Narrator
Device_136.text: *The device yearns for the creature, for every part of you tainted by its presence. You will be consumed.*

Device_62.speaker: Narrator
Device_62.text: *The tadpole quivers. A different magic is building within it. This one is ancient. Rotten.*

Device_32.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
Device_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The machine rumbles/shudders  it's being pushed to its capacity

Device_54.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_54.text: Pursue the visions you saw. See where they lead.

Device_16.speaker: Narrator
Device_16.text: *Your life is laid bare among those that came before. Your innermost thoughts are turned to silver thread and relayed to the Astral Sea.*

Device_90.speaker: Narrator
Device_90.text: *The voices of the dead cry out as one. The zaith'isk collects memories from the infected - and executes them. It is not for curing. It's for killing.*

Device_52.speaker: Narrator
Device_52.text: *The pain is too great. The visions flicker but refuse to come into focus.*

Device_209.speaker: Player
Device_209.text: Complete your purification. Surrender to Vlaakith's will.

Device_196.speaker: Narrator
Device_196.text: *Finally, the device makes contact. You feel your spirit unravelling, drawn from you in sinewy threads.*

Device_34.speaker: Narrator
Device_34.text: *Your body is a leaden husk, abandoned as you drift along the threads into the darkness. Death awaits.*

Device_87.speaker: Narrator
Device_87.text: *Unable to find its target, the device unleashes indiscriminately through your body.*
Device_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony.

Device_35.speaker: Narrator
Device_35.text: *You feel joints breaking, your blood vessels rupturing. Your body crumples. Your heart shudders.*

Device_18.speaker: Player
Device_18.text: Pray for deliverance. Flood the creature with divine power.

Device_58.speaker: Narrator
Device_58.text: *You pour yourself into the tadpole's putrid magic. Its strength multiplied, it unleashes on the machine.*
Device_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony. No visualisation of the magic/power being used - it's insdie their head.

Device_184.speaker: Narrator
Device_184.text: *The two forces fuse violently together, your brain their conduit. Your body and mind drift apart - you are being undone.*

Device_143.speaker: Narrator
Device_143.text: *The tadpole senses your interference. It withdraws, coiling the putrid magic tightly within.*

Device_155.speaker: Player
Device_155.text: Focus on this ancient magic. Feed it with your own.

Device_148.speaker: Player
Device_148.text: Follow the strange magic to its source.

Device_77.speaker: Player
Device_77.text: LET THE TADPOLE FEED ON YOUR RAGE. MAKE IT STRONG.

Device_177.speaker: Narrator
Device_177.text: *Your limbs are unresponsive, cut off by the device's magic. You can't move.*

Device_178.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_178.text: The zaith'isk is the only thing that can help you now.
Device_178.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

Device_166.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_166.text: The pain. It's - it's too much. Can't. Endure.

Device_131.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
Device_131.text: I will not let this happen to you!
Device_131.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

Device_132.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player has been blown aside by the explosion.

Device_188.speaker: Narrator
Device_188.text: *The room swims back into focus. Inside your head, you feel a familiar squirm. You escaped, but so did your tadpole.*
Device_188.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

Device_110.speaker: Narrator
Device_110.text: *The room swims back into focus. Your mind is intact, yet unfamiliar. Inside it, the tadpole lives on. And you feel different.*
Device_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

Device_64.speaker: Narrator
Device_64.text: *The room swims back into focus. Your mind is fractured, but intact. Inside it, the tadpole lives on. And you feel different.*
Device_64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

Device_174.speaker: Narrator
Device_174.text: *The room swims back into focus as sensation returns to your body. You are intact. As is your tadpole.*
Device_174.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

Device_38.speaker: Narrator
Device_38.text: *The room swims back into focus. You are intact, but no longer whole. The tadpole arches in satisfaction - it lives on.*
Device_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

Device_37.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_37.text: No - NO. The zaith'isk... What have you done?

Device_11.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_11.text: And yet you live, and so does your parasite.

Device_20.speaker: Narrator
Device_20.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*

Device_113.speaker: Player
Device_113.text: The parasite lives, yes. And thank goodness - it saved me.

Device_114.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_114.text: And it destroyed a zaith'isk... Then its power is even more unique than I thought. I must examine it.
Device_114.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

Device_65.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_65.text: Since the zaith'isk did not extract it, we must resort to more traditional means.

Device_73.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_73.text: Wait here. I will gather my tools.
Device_73.context: NodeContext: She's lying - she's going to call the guards

Device_92.speaker: Player
Device_92.text: Your zaith'isk tried to kill me. And failed.

Device_89.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_89.context: NodeContext: pissed off - how dare you accuse her machinery of failing!

Device_200.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_200.text: The only variable in this experience was you - and your parasite. And I will uncover how this happened.

Device_199.speaker: Player
Device_199.text: You're wrong. The parasite's dead. I felt it die.

Device_129.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_129.text: Really? Then - all this destruction was a symptom of its power... Incredible.

Device_59.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_59.text: I am disappointed that we could not extract it alive. It would have been an exceptional specimen.

Device_130.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_130.text: In any case, your problem is resolved. Leave me. I must salvage what I can.

Device_76.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_76.text: You're lying. You're protecting it. I knew it - the parasite has burrowed deeper than I thought. It already owns you.

Device_119.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_119.text: We must extract it from you as soon as possible.
Device_119.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

Device_85.speaker: Player
Device_85.text: Pretend the zaith'isk wiped your memories and you don't know what she's talking about.

Device_150.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_150.text: Hmmm... The zaith'isk must have damaged you when it was destroyed.

Device_68.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_68.text: Frustrating. I should have liked to have found out what happened.

Device_51.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_51.text: But I've no use for gibbering idiots. Leave me.

Device_179.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_179.text: This childish display is fooling no one.

Device_84.speaker: Narrator
Device_84.text: *There's something in her voice that goes beyond rage - curiosity, perhaps, or regret. Whatever it is, you cannot identify it.*

Device_167.speaker: Shadowheart
Device_167.text: There's got to be a way to stop this thing!

Device_193.speaker: Astarion
Device_193.text: What are you doing? Turn it off!

Device_138.speaker: Wyll
Device_138.text: Enough, already - we need to stop this thing!

Device_183.speaker: Gale
Device_183.text: There has to be a way to stop this thing!

Device_81.speaker: Karlach
Device_81.text: There's got to be some way to stop this thing!

Device_208.speaker: Halsin
Device_208.text: There must be some way to stop this.

Device_189.speaker: Narrator
Device_189.text: *You urge your body from the chair with every fibre of your consciousness, but can't lift so much as a finger.*

Device_116.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
Device_116.text: This is a death wish. I won't allow it.
Device_116.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

Device_47.speaker: Narrator
Device_47.text: *The device misses its mark, searing the back of your skull. The world grows dimmer, your perception weakens.*

Device_139.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_139.text: Focus! The procedure is almost complete.

Device_44.speaker: Player
Device_44.text: Enough is enough. Get out now.

Device_80.speaker: Narrator
Device_80.text: *The parasite burrows deeper, sinking its teeth into your brain's exposed tissue. It sucks greedily.*
Device_80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

Device_158.speaker: Shadowheart
Device_158.text: This 'cure' looks set to kill you - get out!

Device_172.speaker: Astarion
Device_172.text: It's too much, you can't take it. Get out of there, now!

Device_122.speaker: Wyll
Device_122.text: Hells - I've got a bad feeling about this.

Device_171.speaker: Gale
Device_171.text: That's no cure - it's going to kill you. Get out!

Device_112.speaker: Karlach
Device_112.text: This can't be right. That things going to kill you - move, now!

Device_205.speaker: Halsin
Device_205.text: That contraption looks set to kill you, not save you. Get clear of it, at once!

Device_24.speaker: Narrator
Device_24.text: *The machine lashes out aimlessly. Your right temple burns, then numbs. Part of you is gone - a part you can no longer recall.*
Device_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face contorts in agony

Device_207.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_207.text: Hmm. An unusually stubborn specimen. Don't let it slip away.
Device_207.context: NodeContext: Slight unease - this is taking longer than usual

Device_185.speaker: Player
Device_185.text: Focus the device on your tadpole.

Device_25.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_25.text: My time is not yours to waste. Do you have a tadpole or not?

Device_144.speaker: Player
Device_144.text: I do. Please - get it out of me.

Device_98.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_98.text: To sit in the zaith'isk is a rare blessing, kin. Be grateful.

Device_147.speaker: Narrator
Device_147.text: *To the weak, the zaith'isk may look a horror. To a githyanki, it holds the promise of purity.*

Device_153.speaker: Narrator
Device_153.text: *The zaith'isk. This unnatural device offers your best chance of purification.*
Device_153.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.

AD_DoctorAtAmbush_0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
AD_DoctorAtAmbush_0.text: Purge the infected only. Leave enough to study.

DeviceDoctorInterrupt_2.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
DeviceDoctorInterrupt_2.text: The zaith'isk is not a child's play thing.

DeviceDoctorInterrupt_3.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
DeviceDoctorInterrupt_3.text: If you require its services, speak to me. Otherwise - leave.

AD_DoctorGoesToDevice_0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
AD_DoctorGoesToDevice_0.text: Even githyanki rarely experience the zaith'isk. You are very lucky, istik.

AD_DoctorGoesToDevice_1.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
AD_DoctorGoesToDevice_1.text: Most of our kin never get to experience the zaith'isk. Vlaakith smiles on you.
